title: Manage Regional Sports Programming
description: A national broadcaster needs to show different live games in different cities based on regional broadcast rights.

tasks.description: Retrieve the broadcast schedule and the regional rights for all games being played tonight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of which game should be shown in which city.

tasks.description: Configure the broadcast playout system to route the correct game feed to each regional affiliate station.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the routing rules for the evening's broadcasts.

tasks.description: Monitor the feeds at the start of the broadcast to ensure all regions are receiving the correct game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the correct content is being broadcast in each region.
